options.name: enable_snippets
options.description: Enables snippet completions when the client also supports them

options.name: enable_argument_placeholders
options.description: Whether to enable function argument placeholder completions

options.name: enable_ast_check_diagnostics
options.description: Whether to enable ast-check diagnostics

options.name: enable_build_on_save
options.description: Whether to enable build-on-save diagnostics

options.name: enable_autofix
options.description: Whether to automatically fix errors on save. Currently supports adding and removing discards.

options.name: enable_import_embedfile_argument_completions
options.description: Whether to enable import/embedFile argument completions

options.name: semantic_tokens
options.description: Set level of semantic tokens. Partial only includes information that requires semantic analysis.

options.name: enable_inlay_hints
options.description: Enables inlay hint support when the client also supports it

options.name: inlay_hints_show_variable_declaration
options.description: Enable inlay hints for variable declarations

options.name: inlay_hints_show_parameter_name
options.description: Enable inlay hints for parameter names

options.name: inlay_hints_show_builtin
options.description: Enable inlay hints for builtin functions

options.name: inlay_hints_exclude_single_argument
options.description: Don't show inlay hints for single argument calls

options.name: inlay_hints_hide_redundant_param_names
options.description: Hides inlay hints when parameter name matches the identifier (e.g. foo: foo)

options.name: inlay_hints_hide_redundant_param_names_last_token
options.description: Hides inlay hints when parameter name matches the last token of a parameter node (e.g. foo: bar.foo, foo: &foo)

options.name: operator_completions
options.description: Enables `*` and `?` operators in completion lists

options.name: warn_style
options.description: Enables warnings for style guideline mismatches

options.name: highlight_global_var_declarations
options.description: Whether to highlight global var declarations

options.name: dangerous_comptime_experiments_do_not_enable
options.description: Whether to use the comptime interpreter

options.name: include_at_in_builtins
options.description: Whether the @ sign should be part of the completion of builtins

options.name: skip_std_references
options.description: When true, skips searching for references in std. Improves lookup speed for functions in user's code. Renaming and go-to-definition will continue to work as is

options.name: max_detail_length
options.description: The detail field of completions is truncated to be no longer than this (in bytes)

options.name: prefer_ast_check_as_child_process
options.description: Can be used in conjuction with `enable_ast_check_diagnostics` to favor using `zig ast-check` instead of ZLS's fork

options.name: record_session
options.description: When true, zls will record all request is receives and write in into `record_session_path`, so that they can replayed with `zls replay`

options.name: record_session_path
options.description: Output file path when `record_session` is set. The recommended file extension *.zlsreplay

options.name: replay_session_path
options.description: Used when calling `zls replay` for specifying the replay file. If no extra argument is given `record_session_path` is used as the default path.

options.name: builtin_path
options.description: Path to 'builtin;' useful for debugging, automatically set if let null

options.name: zig_lib_path
options.description: Zig library path, e.g. `/path/to/zig/lib/zig`, used to analyze std library imports

options.name: zig_exe_path
options.description: Zig executable path, e.g. `/path/to/zig/zig`, used to run the custom build runner. If `null`, zig is looked up in `PATH`. Will be used to infer the zig standard library path if none is provided

options.name: build_runner_path
options.description: Path to the `build_runner.zig` file provided by zls. null is equivalent to `${executable_directory}/build_runner.zig`

options.name: global_cache_path
options.description: Path to a directory that will be used as zig's cache. null is equivalent to `${KnownFolders.Cache}/zls`

options.name: build_runner_global_cache_path
options.description: Path to a directory that will be used as the global cache path when executing a projects build.zig. null is equivalent to the path shown by `zig env`

options.name: completions_with_replace
options.description: Completions confirm behavior. If 'true', replace the text after the cursor
